title: Pixel 3XL shuts down when unplugged with June2020 security update. Even though battery is at 90%
content: After the June 2020 update, my pixel 3xl shutsdown when it's not plugged in. It's stuck at 90% battery. It doesn't charge any more than that. It was fine until the update. Is there a way to fix this?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
